d: Siona is a simple sack dress design

s.lengthTooShortForBelt.d: The Dress length is to short to include the Belt.
s.lengthTooShortForChannel.d: The Dress length is to short to include the Channel.
s.lengthTooShortForPockets.d: The Dress length is to short to include the Pockets.

bandType.d: Whether to include a belt or channel to fit the waist.

bandWidth.d: Controls the width of the belt & channel.

beltLength.d: Controls the length of the belt.

beltLoopNumber.d: Controls the number of belt loops to include.

beltLoopWidth.d: Controls the width of the belt loops.

centreSaWidth.d: Controls the width of the centre seam allowance. At 0% the seam is on the fold.

dressFullness.d: Controls the angle used to create the dress fullness.

hemWidth.d: Controls the width of the hem allowance. At 0% the hem will need to be bound.

length.d: Controls the length of the dress. 0% waist length, 50% hips length, 100% seat length, 150% upper leg length, 200% knee length, 250% floor length/

lengthBonus.d: Adds or remove extra length to the dress.

neckHemWidth.d: Controls the width of the neck seam allowance. At 0% the neck will need to be bound.

neckOpening.d: Controls the width at the neck opening.

pocketBagSaWidth.d: Controls the width of the pocket bag seam allowance.

pocketDepth.d: Controls the depth of the pocket bag.

pocketOpening.d: Controls the placement of the pocket opening.

pocketOpeningLength.d: Controls the length of the pocket opening.

pocketWidth.d: Controls the width of the pocket bag.

pocketsBool.d: Whether to include pockets or not.

scyeDepth.d: Controls how big the arm opening will be.

sideSeamSaWidth.d: Controls the width of the side seam allowance.

shoulderToShoulderEase.d: Controls the amount of ease between your shoulders.

sleeveLength.d: Controls the length of the sleeves. 50% elbow length, 100% wrist length.

sleeveLengthBonus.d: Adds or remove extra length to the sleeve.

sleeveHemWidth.d: Controls the width of the sleeve hem allowance. At 0% the sleeve hem will need to be bound.

sleeves.d: Whether to include sleeves or not.

wristEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at your wrist.
